Thornton Tomlinson

  1. Foster Name: Floyd T. Browning
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Floid
  3. Foster Family: Charles and Julia Browning
  4. Location of Family: Fairbury, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Fairbury, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 18 months
  8. Date of Birth: 1905-03-26, New Rochelle, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1982-11-05, Vancouver, WA
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Fairbury Gazette, 21 September 1906; Fairbury Gazette, 5 October 1906; 1910 United Stated Federal Census; OTR; National Orphan Train Complex; OTHSA Membership Directory.
